cookingMethod: 1. Cook spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water. 2. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. 3. In a bowl, whisk egg yolks, parmesan cheese, and black pepper. 4. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. 5. Remove pan from heat and add egg mixture. 6. Toss until sauce thickens.

1. Preheat oven to 425Â°F. 2. Place chicken, potatoes, carrots, onions, and garlic in a roasting pan. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. 4. Roast for 1 hour or until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender.

1. Cut beef into thin strips. 2. In a pan, cook beef until browned. 3. Add mushrooms and onion and cook until tender. 4. Stir in sour cream and beef broth. 5. Simmer for 10 minutes. 6. Serve over egg noodles.
1. Cut beef into thin strips. 2. In a bowl, mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and cornstarch. 3. In a pan, stir-fry beef until browned. 4. Add broccoli and stir-fry until tender
